SELECT i.inventory_id inventoryId, f.film_id filmId, f.title title,
COUNT(case when i.store_id = 1 and `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 1 then 1 END) 'store1', COUNT(case when i.store_id = 2 and `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 1 then 1 END) 'store2',
COUNT(case when `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 1 AND i.inventory_id IS NOT NULL then 1 END) 'totalInStock',
COUNT(case when `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 0 then 1 END) 'notInStock'
, COUNT(i.film_id) 'total'
FROM inventory i RIGHT JOIN film f ON f.film_id = i.film_id
AND f.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND i.store_id = #{storeId}
AND `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 0
GROUP BY f.title LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT f.title) FROM inventory i RIGHT JOIN film f ON f.film_id = i.film_id
AND f.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND i.store_id = #{storeId}
AND `inventory_in_stock`(i.inventory_id) = 0
